SELECT ageGroups.ageGroup, IFNULL(userCounts.memberCount, 0) AS memberCount FROM (SELECT '10-19' AS ageGroup UNION ALL SELECT '20-29' UNION ALL SELECT '30-39' UNION ALL SELECT '40-49' UNION ALL SELECT '50-59' UNION ALL SELECT '60+') AS ageGroups LEFT JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN '10-19' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20-29' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30-39' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40-49' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50-59' WHEN TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, birthday, CURDATE()) >= 60 THEN '60+' END AS ageGroup, COUNT(*) AS memberCount FROM USER GROUP BY ageGroup) AS userCounts ON ageGroups.ageGroup = userCounts.ageGroup ORDER BY FIELD(ageGroups.ageGroup, '10-19', '20-29', '30-39', '40-49', '50-59', '60+')
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM REPORT r WHERE DATE(r.report_datetime) = CURDATE()

SELECT p.post_id AS postId, ru.nickName AS reportedUserNickName, pu.nickName AS reporterUserNickName, p.report_count AS reportCount FROM REPORT r JOIN USER ru ON r.reported_user_id = ru.user_id JOIN USER pu ON r.reporter_user_id = pu.user_id JOIN POST p ON r.post_id = p.post_id WHERE DATE(r.report_datetime) = CURDATE() GROUP BY p.post_id, ru.nickName, pu.nickName LIMIT 5
